mapper.select: SELECT t2.*, t1.id AS category_detail_id, t1.subject_code AS category_datail_parent_subject_code, IFNULL( ( SELECT t3.length FROM subject_length t3 WHERE t3.`level` = (t2.`level` + 1) ), 2 ) AS next_level_length FROM account_subject t1, account_subject t2 WHERE t1.parent_subject_code = #{parent_subject_code} AND t2.parent_subject_code = t1.subject_code AND t1.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY t2.subject_code

SELECT t.*, IFNULL( ( SELECT t1.length FROM subject_length t1 WHERE t1.`level` = (t.`level` + 1) ), 2 ) AS next_level_length FROM account_subject t WHERE t.parent_subject_code = #{parent_subject_code} AND t.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY t.subject_code

SELECT t.*, CONCAT(t.subject_code,t.subject_name) as subject_textname FROM account_subject t WHERE LEVEL > 0 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT parent_subject_code FROM account_subject b WHERE t.subject_code = b.parent_subject_code) AND t.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY t.subject_code
